content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: end_stone_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "netherrack", "quantity": 42, "index": 10}, {"type": "brown_carpet", "quantity": 24, "index": 13}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 4, "index": 17}, {"type": "oxeye_daisy", "quantity": 39, "index": 30}, {"type": "salmon", "quantity": 34, "index": 38}]

thought: To solve this task I need to craft end_stone_bricks. End_stone_bricks require placing 4 end_stone in the crafting grid, therefore I will first need to move the end_stone from slot 17 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 17 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: end_stone_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "netherrack", "quantity": 42, "index": 10}, {"type": "brown_carpet", "quantity": 24, "index": 13}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 3, "index": 17}, {"type": "oxeye_daisy", "quantity": 39, "index": 30}, {"type": "salmon", "quantity": 34, "index": 38}]

thought: Since the end_stone has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move another end_stone to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the end_stone to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 17 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: end_stone_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "netherrack", "quantity": 42, "index": 10}, {"type": "brown_carpet", "quantity": 24, "index": 13}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 2, "index": 17}, {"type": "oxeye_daisy", "quantity": 39, "index": 30}, {"type": "salmon", "quantity": 34, "index": 38}]
thought: Since the end_stone has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move another end_stone below it. Slot 4 is below slot 1, and therefore I will move the end_stone to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 17 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: end_stone_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "netherrack", "quantity": 42, "index": 10}, {"type": "brown_carpet", "quantity": 24, "index": 13}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "oxeye_daisy", "quantity": 39, "index": 30}, {"type": "salmon", "quantity": 34, "index": 38}]

thought: Since the end_stone has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move another end_stone to the right of it. Slot 5 is to the right of slot 4, and therefore I will move the end_stone to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 17 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: end_stone_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "end_stone_bricks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "netherrack", "quantity": 42, "index": 10}, {"type": "brown_carpet", "quantity": 24, "index": 13}, {"type": "oxeye_daisy", "quantity": 39, "index": 30}, {"type": "salmon", "quantity": 34, "index": 38}]
thought: Now I can craft the end_stone_bricks by moving them from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
